meanings.definition: Twisted or bent out of its normal shape
meanings.sent1: The contorted tree branches reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her face contorted in pain as she stubbed her toe.
meanings.sent3: The contorted balloon animal made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The contorted road ahead seemed to lead nowhere.
meanings.sent5: The contorted pretzel was difficult to untangle.

meanings.definition: To twist or bend out of its normal shape
meanings.sent1: He contorted his body to fit through the narrow opening.
meanings.sent2: The snake contorted itself into a tight coil.
meanings.sent3: The contorted dance moves impressed the audience.
meanings.sent4: She contorted her face into a funny expression.
meanings.sent5: The contorted wire formed intricate patterns.
